product_details_and_care:
Gleaming, oversized spiral hardware—inspired by classic notebook bindings—lends modern polish to this colorblocked calfskin crossbody. Divided inside for ease of organization, the look is sleek, sculptural and utterly chic.
Magnetic-flap closure
Adjustable crossbody strap
Dual interior compartments; wall pocket
Leather
Imported
SPACE: A shop for emerging and advanced designers
